Panel.Name: Toolbar
Panel.Label: Toolbar
Panel.Description: The main toolbar, displayed across the top of the map

Panel.Name: ToolbarVertical
Panel.Label: Vertical Toolbar
Panel.Description: The vertical toolbar, displayed on the left side of the map

Panel.Name: tabOverviewContent
Panel.Label: Overview Map
Panel.Description: The tab containing the overview map

Panel.Name: tabTaskPaneContent
Panel.Label: Task Pane
Panel.Description: The tab containing the task pane

Panel.Name: tabSelectionContent
Panel.Label: Selection Panel
Panel.Description: The tab displaying info on the current selection

Panel.Name: StatusCoords
Panel.Label: Current Coords
Panel.Description: Displays the current coordinates on the status bar

Panel.Name: StatusSelection
Panel.Label: Status Selection
Panel.Description: Displays selection info in the status bar

Panel.Name: StatusScale
Panel.Label: Status Scale
Panel.Description: Displays current scale in the status bar

Panel.Name: StatusViewSize
Panel.Label: Status Size
Panel.Description: Displays the view size in the status bar
